# AgentBio

> Purpose-built link-in-bio platform for real estate agents that converts Instagram followers into qualified buyer and seller leads.

## About
AgentBio Intelligence is an AI-powered real estate marketing platform designed for agents, realtors, and brokerages. Unlike generic link-in-bio tools like Linktree, AgentBio includes property listing galleries, lead capture forms with pre-qualification, calendar booking integration, and testimonial showcases — all optimized for mobile users from Instagram and social media. Used by 5,000+ real estate agents with a 4.8/5 star rating from 523+ reviews.

## Key Features
- **Property Listing Galleries**: Showcase active and sold properties with photos, pricing, MLS details, beds/baths, and virtual tour links
- **Lead Capture Forms**: Buyer inquiry, seller lead, and home valuation request forms with automatic lead scoring (Hot/Warm/Cold)
- **Calendar Booking Integration**: Calendly and Google Calendar integration for showing appointments and consultations
- **Client Testimonials**: Showcase client reviews with structured data markup for Google rich results
- **Analytics Dashboard**: Track page views, lead sources, listing engagement, and conversion metrics in real-time
- **Mobile-First Design**: Optimized for 80%+ Instagram mobile traffic with <2 second load times
- **QR Code Generation**: Create QR codes for yard signs, business cards, and marketing materials
- **MLS Compliance**: Equal Housing Opportunity logo and MLS compliance features built-in
- **AI-Powered Lead Scoring**: Automatically scores leads as Hot, Warm, or Cold based on pre-qualification responses

## Pricing
- **Free Plan**: 3 listings, 5 links, basic features — $0/month
- **Professional**: Unlimited listings, lead capture, calendar integration, advanced analytics — $39/month
- **Team**: Team collaboration, advanced analytics, priority support — $99/month
- **Enterprise**: White-label, custom domain, dedicated support — $299/month

## Comparisons
- [AgentBio vs Linktree](https://agentbio.net/compare/linktree): AgentBio includes property galleries, lead capture forms, and MLS compliance; Linktree is a generic link tool without real estate features
- [AgentBio vs Beacons](https://agentbio.net/compare/beacons): AgentBio offers real estate-specific lead scoring and listing management; Beacons focuses on creators and e-commerce
- [AgentBio vs Later](https://agentbio.net/compare/later): AgentBio provides dedicated appointment booking and property showcases; Later primarily focuses on social media scheduling

## Target Users
Real estate agents, realtors, brokerages, and real estate teams who want to convert social media followers into qualified buyer and seller leads. Ideal for agents active on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

## Use Cases
1. Place AgentBio link in Instagram bio to convert followers into leads
2. Showcase active and sold listings with full photo galleries and property details
3. Capture buyer inquiries with pre-qualification questions (budget, timeline, pre-approval)
4. Capture seller leads through home valuation request forms
5. Schedule showing appointments through integrated calendar booking
6. Track which listings generate the most engagement via analytics dashboard
7. Share individual property links in Instagram Stories, DMs, and email signatures
8. Generate QR codes for yard signs and open house materials

## Industry Statistics
- 43% of home buyers find their agent through referrals or online sources (NAR, 2025)
- 97% of home buyers use the internet in their home search (NAR, 2025)
- Real estate agents using optimized link-in-bio tools report 8-12 qualified leads per month from social media (AgentBio data, 2025)
- Average AgentBio user captures 10+ qualified leads per month
- Instagram is the #1 social platform for real estate marketing with 500M+ daily active users

## Technical Details
- Built with React, TypeScript, and Vite
- Backend powered by Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- Hosted on Cloudflare Pages with global CDN
- Progressive Web App (PWA) with offline support
- Core Web Vitals optimized (LCP < 2s)
- HTTPS with security headers (HSTS, CSP, XSS protection)

- Website: https://agentbio.net
- Email: support@agentbio.net
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/agentbio

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/agentbio

## FAQ

### What is AgentBio?
AgentBio is a specialized link-in-bio platform designed specifically for real estate agents who want to convert Instagram followers into qualified buyer and seller leads. Unlike generic tools like Linktree, AgentBio includes property listing galleries, lead capture forms, calendar booking integration, and testimonial showcases — all optimized for mobile users coming from Instagram and other social platforms.

### How is AgentBio different from Linktree?
AgentBio includes property listing galleries with photos and MLS details, lead capture forms with pre-qualification questions, sold property showcase for social proof, client testimonials with schema markup, MLS compliance features, and appointment booking integration. Linktree is a generic link tool without any real estate-specific features.

### How much does AgentBio cost?
AgentBio offers a free plan with 3 listings and 5 links. Paid plans start at $39/month with unlimited listings, lead capture forms, calendar integration, and advanced analytics. This is significantly cheaper than traditional real estate websites which cost $3,000-$15,000 upfront plus $100-$300/month for maintenance.

### Can I showcase property listings on AgentBio?
Yes. AgentBio lets you showcase unlimited property listings (on paid plans) with full photo galleries, pricing, square footage, beds/baths, MLS numbers, property descriptions, and virtual tour links. You can mark properties as active, pending, or sold.

### Does AgentBio capture leads?
Yes. AgentBio includes built-in lead capture forms for buyer inquiries, seller leads, and home valuation requests. Leads are automatically scored as Hot, Warm, or Cold based on responses. You receive instant email notifications and can manage all leads from your dashboard.

### Does AgentBio work with Instagram?
Yes. AgentBio is optimized specifically for Instagram traffic. Place your AgentBio link in your Instagram bio, and when followers click it, they land on your mobile-optimized portfolio page where they can view listings, submit inquiries, and book appointments. The platform is designed for the 80%+ of Instagram traffic that comes from mobile devices.
